Detailed Description

MGglViewAttrib is a class to serialize MGOpenGLView, used by MGContext.

set the viewing environment info.

Parameters:
fard near and far data
center Model's size(diameter) and the center
cy Current viewing's scale, and panning data(cx, cy).
up_vector viewing eye position and view up vector These parameters are used fro gluLookAt. see the explanation.
currentMat OpenGL's ModelView current matrix.
